Text: Nice machine youssef!  I've got an Intel Core2Quad with an HD5870 an it runs everything I need it to on full spec.  Your machine sounds dreamy though!  Must have cost you a fair few pennies though, aye!  Good shout on the 2 x 80GB SSD; the ultimate upgrade nowadays over traditional hard drives.

The first few minutes of this file was great, but towards the end of the Intro song it suddenly stops playing.  I also downloaded the 720p version, and the same thing happened.  I can't work out why >_
